channel.title: Logan Pendragon on The Huddle
channel.description: Recent content in Logan Pendragon on The Huddle

item.title: Sharing The Work
item.description: Standing on the sidelines is, for many players, the hardest or most frustrating part of being on a team. Ultimate is special in the larger world of sports in that the sideline is a great place to help your team out. Where in other sports the sideline is not allowed to actively participate by communicating with their fellow players on the field, in Ultimate the sideline can work as an eighth player, one with position and focus dedicated to improving the outcome of strategies and plays being made my fielded players.
